description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. BugRace is a 1 to 4 player multiplication practice game. Playing like a board game, the object is to answer multiplication problems correctly so you can spin the wheel and advance around the board. Careful, if your unlucky ant lands on a red stone, an unfortunate accident will occur as a fully rendered animation, causing the player to miss a turn. How well do you know your multiplication tables?
description.short: BugRace is a 1 to 4 player multiplication practice game. Playing like a board game, the object is to answer multiplication problems correctly so you can spin the wheel and advance around the board. Careful, if your unlucky ant lands on a red stone, an unfortunate accident will occur as a fully rendered animation, causing the player to miss a turn. How well do you know your multiplication tables?
